title: Tour de France Femmes: Riders decry lack of cohesive chase as Lotte Kopecky attacks to victory
content:
Though several teams had multiple riders in the group behind the Belgian, a fractured chase only helped to cement Kopecky's advantage.

Read the full article at Tour de France Femmes: Riders decry lack of cohesive chase as Lotte Kopecky attacks to victory on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
